name: Holiday Eggnog
description: No matter how you like it (thick or thin, boozy or light), there's an eggnog recipe out there for practically everyone. Here's ours!
recipeIngredient: 8 ounces dark rum (something like Bacardi 8, Appleton V/X or Mount Gay Eclipse)

recipeInstructions.text: Beat egg yolks until smooth, and gradually add sugar, beating steadily until well mixed. Add milk, cream and spirits and mix well. In a separate bowl, beat egg whites to firm peaks; fold into yolk mixture. Serve in cups or goblets, and grate fresh nutmeg over the top of each serving.
